title: Theories of Grammar (HG4041) — Nanyang Technological University — Fall 2025
description: Snapshot of the course *Theories of Grammar* (HG4041), taught at NTU in 2020. Includes lecture slides, problem sets with solutions, readings, example grammars, and supplementary LaTeX templates. Topics covered include part of speech types, constituent structure, syntax-semantics interface, complementation, raising, control, passives, long-distance dependencies, Sign-based Construction Grammar, and minimalist syntax.
